Metadata.title: LinkNest
Metadata.description: LinkNest is a link aggregation platform

Login.title: Welcome Back

Login.subtitle: Your Digital Nest, Perfectly Organized.
Login.loginFailed: Failed to log in, please try again later.

Register.title: Create Your LinkNest Account
Register.description: Organize your digital world, one link at a time.
Register.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter and one number
Register.registerSuccess: Registered successfully, redirecting to login page...
Register.registerFailed: Failed to register, please try again later.
Register.pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
Register.codeSent: Code sent, please check your email.
Register.codeSendingFailed: Failed to send code, please try again later.

Home.showAllYourSavedLinks: Showing all your saved links. {count} items found
Home.noLinksFoundInThisCategory: No links found in this category.
Home.exportSuccess: Bookmarks exported. Download should start shortly.

ImportBookmarks.title: Import Bookmarks
ImportBookmarks.description: Upload your exported HTML or JSON bookmark file to merge it into LinkNest.
ImportBookmarks.dropTitle: Click or drag file to this area
ImportBookmarks.dropDescription: Supports HTML (.html/.htm) and JSON files from browsers or backups.
ImportBookmarks.hint: We will parse categories and links and skip duplicates automatically.

ImportBookmarks.invalidType: Please upload an HTML or JSON file.
ImportBookmarks.fileRequired: Please choose a file before importing.
ImportBookmarks.failed: Import failed, please try again later.

ThemeSelector.title: Switch Theme
ThemeSelector.description: Pick one of the 35 themes. Your choice applies immediately.
